mapper.select: select id, file_name, upload_time, upload_username, group_name, remote_filename, server_ip from test.fastdfs_file_upload_info where id = #{id}
select id, file_name, upload_time, upload_username, group_name, remote_filename, server_ip from test.fastdfs_file_upload_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into test.fastdfs_file_upload_info(file_name, upload_time, upload_username, group_name, remote_filename, server_ip) values (#{fileName}, #{uploadTime}, #{uploadUsername}, #{groupName}, #{remoteFilename}, #{serverIp})

insert into test.fastdfs_file_upload_info(file_name, upload_time, upload_username, group_name, remote_filename, server_ip) values
(#{entity.fileName}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.uploadUsername}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.remoteFilename}, #{entity.serverIp})

insert into test.fastdfs_file_upload_info(file_name, upload_time, upload_username, group_name, remote_filename, server_ip) values
(#{entity.fileName}, #{entity.uploadTime}, #{entity.uploadUsername}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.remoteFilename}, #{entity.serverIp})
on duplicate key update file_name = values(file_name) , upload_time = values(upload_time) , upload_username = values(upload_username) , group_name = values(group_name) , remote_filename = values(remote_filename) , server_ip = values(server_ip)
mapper.update:
update test.fastdfs_file_upload_info
file_name = #{fileName},
upload_time = #{uploadTime},
upload_username = #{uploadUsername},
group_name = #{groupName},
remote_filename = #{remoteFilename},
server_ip = #{serverIp},
where id = #{id}
